CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 7, 1949, pg. 7 reads: "Andantes - This group of young ladies, known as the "Andante," is pictured above, planning for the skate and dance party to be held at Bridgeville Skating Rink, Wednesday, May 18. Left to right, first row: Dorothy Silver, vice president; Irene Wright, sponsor; Joan Bruce, social chairman; Greta Thompson, president.  Second row: Kathy Higgenbotham, Marlene Burleigh, Alice Brown, Betty Jane Berry."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eight Andante club members, from left, first row: Dorothy Silver, Irene Wright, Joan Bruce, and Greta Thompson;  second row: Kathy Higgenbotham, Marlene Burleigh, Alice Brown, and Betty Jane Berry, seated on steps of brick building with leaded glass windows on doors
